articles.title: Share Market Highlights 27 Sep 2023: Nifty above 19,700; Sensex gains 173 pts; L&T, CIL among top gainers - BusinessLine
articles.description: Sensex, Nifty updates on 27 September 2023: Benchmark equity indices Sensex and Nifty rebounded from early lows to settle higher on Wednesday following buying in Reliance Industries, Larsen & Toubro and ITC and positive trends in Asian and European markets. T…
